work.title: Platform Engineer
work.description: Mangement, engineering of large scale data driven application architecture, responsibilities include change management, bug fixes, management of version control & application maintenance

work.title: Product Specialist
work.description: Managing queries with; SWIFT, H2H XML file support, API solutions, certificate issues, international payments. Deliver high quality projects, onboarding registrations and focusing on high quality implementation for H2H corporates. Conduct usability testing, constructing test implementation plans and translating insights into workable solutions for system releases. Collaborate with product managers and engineering teams from problem recognition to owning and driving hot-fixes into front-end implementation using applicable frameworks and service management techniques. Working with large scale API’s and the Corporates that use API’s for mobile payments solutions.
